overview: Alan Ween was hit by a train, he survived but is badly disfigured... Some radical scientist promise to re-build him, but as they operate on the night of Halloween 1975 something terrible happens.  For the past 40 odd years the aftermath of that night comes to life each Halloween and each time another story to tell. In Halloween 2018 he's back home again, only this year it's time to try to stop him
title: The Hell Of Ween
